sub_title: Manager Cyber Strategy & Risk at KPMG Netherlands
summary:
Digital information has become the lifeblood of the interconnected business ecosystem and is increasingly valuable to organizations - and to skilled threat actors - making effective Cybersecurity and Privacy more important than ever.  

As a Cybersecurity manager at KPMG I am dedicated to deliver my clients actionable, risk-based, business aligned security approaches to accelerate their digital transformation - with confidence. With an educational background in Criminology and Criminal Justice (specializing in crime towards business), a strong affinity with risk management, and excellent communication skills, I provide my clients with solutions to optimize their Cybersecurity capabilities and securely tackle their key business challenges in Digital Transformation by bridging the gap between business, IT and security. 

With profound experience in setting up and leading projects I have shown a natural talent for building profitable relationships with customers and key decisionmakers.
